summary: Adds an enchanted version of the Psiijic Robes to the player. Enchantments increase power of spells and decrease spell cost
descriptionHtml:
[b]UPDATE:[/b] [size=\"1\"]File name changed to Sorcerer Lord Robes, since [b]powerdown[/b] pointed out to me that a Grand Wizard is a term given to a leading member of the KKK... which this mod has nothing to do with.[/size]

[b]UPDATE 2:[/b] Added an overpowered optional file. and fixed the error that caused Enchanting to gain 15 Points

[b]UPDATE 3:[/b] Added the file to Overpowered... it seems i some how forgot to add the batch file to the Zip file

[b]UPDATE 4:[/b] Added an optional file. It is a custom retexture made using Zackdip\'s textures. [size=\"3\"][b]Full credit goes to Zackdip for these excellent textures and permision to use them[/size][/b]

[center]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/center]

Another simple Batch file. This one adds \'Sorcerer Lord\' Robes (Psiijic) that increase the power of spells and reduce their cost.


[center]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/center]

Installation:
-----------------

Unzip and place the file \"SorcererLord.txt\" into your Skyrim folder (usually located at c:\\steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim)


[center]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/center]

Usage
---------

[size=\"1\"]Note: This file is best used at the start of the game when your hands become unbound. Because of the way the enchantments are applied, the actual value increased depends upon your enchanting level at the time the file is activated.

Enchantment Magnatude = Enchantment Skill level + 35[/size]


in game, access the console (press the \'tilde key\') and type:

[b][size=\"3\"]bat SorcererLord[/size][/b]


The robes should be added and equiped by the file.


[center]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/center]

The file adds:-

[b]Psiijic Gloves:[/b] 
Destruction spells cost [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 50% less to cast.
Destruction spells are [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 50% stronger for [b]0[/b] seconds [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](i.e. permanantly)[/size][/color].

[b]Psiijic Hood:[/b] 
Conjuration spells cost [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 50% less to cast.
Conjuration spells last [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 50% longer for [b]0[/b] seconds.

[b]Psiijic Boots:[/b] 
Restoration spells cost [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 50% less to cast.
Restoration spells are [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 50% stronger for [b]0[/b] seconds.

[b]Psiijic Robes:[/b] 
Alteration spells cost [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 50% less to cast.
Alteration spells last [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 50% longer for [b]0[/b] seconds.

[b]Silver Necklace:[/b] 
Illusion spells cost [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 50% less to cast.
Illusion spells are [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 50% stronger for [b]0[/b] seconds.

[b]Silver Ring:[/b] 
Increases your Magicka by [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 50 Points.
Magicka regenerates [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 50% faster.

[center]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/center]

[b]Optional FIle: Sorcerer Lord OverPowered[/b]

command:

[b][size=\"3\"]bat SorcererLordOP[/size][/b]

Same robes and chain as above, except increased to aprox 215%. Silver ring was change to:

[b]Silver Ring:[/b]
Increases Magical Resistance by [color=\"#8B0000\"][size=\"1\"](approximately)[/size][/color] 215%
Caster Ignores 80% of Physical Damage for 0 seconds

[center]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/center]

If you don\'t like my retexture, i highly recommend Gyo\'s [url=file.php?id=1854]\"Psiijic Re-Skin several versions\"[/url]
